content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** simplifies the process of locating watermarks within business documents. Install our package into your {{EnvName}} applications to take advantage of its benefits.
content.step_1: To utilize our library features, load the {{FileformatCap}} file into an instance of the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} class. You can provide a file path, file stream, or byte stream.
content.step_2: To narrow down the list of potential watermarks, utilize the {{TextSearchCriteriaBold}} object. For example, provide an image to search for similar image watermarks. If searching for textual watermarks, provide text, font, color, and other relevant options.
content.step_3: Retrieve watermarks placed within the document using the {{TextSearchBold}} method of the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} object. You will receive a collection of objects representing potential watermarks for further processing.
content.step_4: Finally, you have the freedom to manipulate the search results as needed. You can delete found watermarks or edit their properties, such as changing size or text.

more_features.title: Optimize Watermark Search in Documents with {{ProdShortName}} API
more_features.description: Master the art of watermark search in any document using Java with the powerful {{ProdShortName}} API in the {{EnvName}} environment.

feature_1.title: Java Tools for Robust Watermark Search
feature_1.content: Enhance your document processing capabilities in Java with {{ProdShortName}}. Our API provides extensive tools to search and identify watermarks based on multiple parameters.

feature_2.title: Pinpoint Watermark Retrieval with Java
feature_2.content: Target specific watermarks with precision in Java. Configure your search to filter by characteristics like size, date, and content, ensuring you find exactly what you need.

feature_3.title: Comprehensive Watermark Analysis
feature_3.content: Leverage Java to conduct thorough analyses of found watermarks. Use {{ProdShortName}} to assess and manage watermarks effectively, enhancing security and compliance measures in your documents.

code_1.title: Java Example: Dynamic Watermark Search
code_1.content: This example demonstrates the use of Java with {{ProdShortName}} to dynamically search for watermarks in documents, illustrating how to handle search results programmatically.
code_1.comment_1: Initialize Java environment and prepare document loading
code_1.comment_2: Configure search filters based on dynamic user-defined criteria
code_1.comment_3: Execute the watermark search using the Java API
code_1.comment_4: Handle and process the search outcomes, preparing for further actions or reporting

header.description: Optimize your workflow efficiency with {{ProdFullName}} innovative watermark search capabilities.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Get info {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} provides a robust solution for watermark management using {{EnvName}}. Developers can effortlessly create, edit, search, and remove watermarks from documents in popular file formats. It supports both text and image watermarks across various document types, including PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, email, and image formats. {{ProdFullName}} seamlessly integrates with all major operating systems and {{EnvName}} versions.

formats.title: Empower Your Workflow with Watermark Search
formats.description: Empower yourself to search and manage watermarks across different file formats with {{ProdFullName}} advanced capabilities.
